name: Chapter 3 – Card 08: Port Launay Shadows
description: Under moonlight, ghostly ships sail again in this haunted bay. The shadows of vessels long sunk dance on waters that remember every secret they've carried.

attributes.value: Phantom vessels guard the marine sanctuary's darkest secret

properties.clue: Tide Riddle: 'When moon is full and tide is high, the phantom cargo comes to light'
visualElements: Pirate lantern glowing on ghost ship
